meanings.definition: Children between the ages of 10 and 12.
meanings.sent1: During the school play, the preteens sang a song together.
meanings.sent2: My sister will be in the preteens age group next year.
meanings.sent3: The preteens giggled uncontrollably at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The preteens blossomed into young adults before our eyes.
meanings.sent5: In the park, the preteens played tag with great enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: The period of time before adolescence.
meanings.sent1: Before reaching adolescence, children go through the preteens stage.
meanings.sent2: The preteens years are a time of transition and growth.
meanings.sent3: During the preteens, kids often have a mix of childlike and mature behaviors.
meanings.sent4: The preteens mark the bridge between childhood and teenage years.
meanings.sent5: In the preteens, kids start to develop their own interests and personalities.
